org.vraptor.validator
Interface ValidationErrors

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<ValidationMessage>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicValidationErrors
public interface ValidationErrors
extends Iterable<ValidationMessage>

Collection of validation errors. List is not used as there should be limited access to some methods.

Author:
Guilherme Silveira
